description: This file defines several reusable UI components for a React-based frontend, including Panel, Table, TextField, Select, and Modal components. These components are designed to provide common UI functionalities such as panels, tables, input fields, select boxes, and modal dialogs.

methods.name: Panel({ title, subtitle, right, children })
methods.description: A card panel component with title, subtitle, right actions, and children content.

methods.name: Table({ columns, data, renderActions })
methods.description: A simple table component that renders columns and data, with optional row actions.

methods.name: TextField({ label, value, onChange, placeholder, type = 'text' })
methods.description: An input field component with label, value, onChange handler, placeholder, and type.

methods.name: Select({ label, value, onChange, options, multiple })
methods.description: A select dropdown component with label, value, onChange handler, options, and support for multiple selections.

methods.name: Modal
methods.description: A modal dialog component that displays content with a title, close button, and optional footer.

ctags.name: Panel
ctags.pattern: /^export function Panel({ title, subtitle, right, children }) {$/

ctags.name: Select
ctags.pattern: /^export function Select({ label, value, onChange, options, multiple }) {$/

ctags.name: TextField
ctags.pattern: /^export function TextField({ label, value, onChange, placeholder, type = 'text' }) {$/
